laws.title: Omniscientrix Informational Horizon Balance
laws.summary: Horizon-scale entropy flux equals Hawking output, maintaining informational balance.

laws.title: Informational–Awareness Wormhole Complementarity
laws.summary: δJ-bridges produce nonlocal coherence without exotic matter across sectors.

laws.title: Awareness–Gravity Coupling Near Horizons
laws.summary: Awareness-field intensifies curvature, subtly shifting horizon geodesics.
